alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 26 at 2:43AM CST until February 27 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM CST /7 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO 10 PM CST /9 PM MST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 45 to 65 mph with gusts up to 105 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, and Davis. * WHEN...From 8 AM CST /7 AM MST/ this morning to 10 PM CST /9 PM MST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Davis Mountains; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
